author: woonsan
msg: Allow *JetspeedPrincipalManagementPortlet* in j2-admin to access portal context class loader because the portlet is dependent on serializable/deserializable objects which can be created by jetspeed classloader only.
I think this is definitely not good practice, but anyway Wicketfilter allows to customize the classloader. ;-)
We need to replace all the models by detachable ones later.
